reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The goal of the project is to contribute towards the response to climate change for poor ethnic minorities in Thanh Hoa province.The project has 4 specific objectives: 1) to improve capacity of local people in Xuan Phu and Phu Nghiem communes on climate ch ange adaptation and mitigation, 2) to develop the sustainable and climate-friendly agro-forestry model for poor ethnic household based on indigenous knowledge and local specialty in Xuan Phu and Phu Nghiem communes, 3) to improve market access for local co mmunities to aim at sustainable agro-forestry production in a climate changing context, 4) to contribute to the selection of suitable climate-friendly agro-forestry models by the local authorities and local people using their own investment. The project w ill be implemented in Xuan Phu and Phu Nghiem communes Quan Hoa district Thanh Hoa Province from January 2014 to April 2016

participating-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

Planned end date of the activity

location.ref: Quan Hoa district in Thanh Hoa Province
